Lyric:
[by:莎士比亚书店]
[00:07.18]I need you (the) I need you
[00:08.69]I need you (the) I need you
[00:10.47]I need you, (the the the the the) 
[00:12.38]I need you (the) I need you
[00:14.00]I need you (the) I need you
[00:15.61]I need you, (the the the the the) 
[00:17.14]You, (the the) 
[00:18.37]I need you the most
[00:20.93]I gave you the key when the door wasn't open, just admit it
[00:27.61]See, I gave you faith, turned your doubt into hoping, can’t deny it
[00:34.49]Now I’m all alone and my joys turned to moping
[00:38.93]Tell me, where are you now that I need you?
[00:44.78]Where are you now?
[00:47.52]Where are you now that I need you?
[00:51.80]Couldn't find you anywhere
[00:54.20]When you broke down I didn't leave you
[00:58.93]I was by your side
[01:01.05]So where are you now that I need you?
[01:06.31]Where are you now that I need you?
[01:20.14]Where are you now that I need you?
[01:33.78]Where are you now that I need you?
[01:47.47]Where are you now that I need you?
[02:07.28]I gave you attention when nobody else was paying
[02:13.96]I gave you the shirt off my back, what you saying?
[02:17.99]To keep you warm
[02:20.77]I showed you the game everybody else was playing, that's for sure
[02:27.51]And I was on my knees when nobody else was praying, oh Lord
[02:38.99]Where are you now that I need you?
[02:45.90]Where are you now that I need you?
[02:48.42]I need you (the) I need you
[02:49.81]I need you (the) I need you
[02:51.60]I need you, (the the the the the) 
[02:52.65]Where are you now that I need you?
[02:53.79]I need you (the) I need you
[02:55.23]I need you (the) I need you
[02:56.75]I need you, (the the the the the)
[02:59.47]I need you the most
[03:13.35]Where are you now that I need you?
[03:27.05]Where are you now that I need you?
[03:40.60]Where are you now that I need you?
[03:54.45]I need you the most (I need you the most, I need you the most)
